Deep in the Jungle...


Coming out of stasis was always the weirdest feelin=
g- almost like
waking from a deep, dark sleep.  Only being in proto-form wa=
sn't
sleep, but a state of unconsciousness.  A place where time had no
mean=
ing, where life and awareness had no existence.  

Coming out of stasis was=
n't waking up; it was being reborn.

One by one, Jynx's systems came online=
, his optics activating to see
360 degrees of jungle surrounding him.  He c=
ould hear birds singing,
bugs chirping, and other various animals making al=
l kinds of noise. 
He blinked once and then hopped down  from his pod, star=
ing at the
jungle with wide eyes.

"Trees! Thereare-notrees-onOmechianPrime=
. Arethere?No. Where-arewe?" 
He raised a hand to scratch his head and then=
 noticed the strange
looking skin and fur.  

"Fur! Fingers! -wait,fingers-=
aren'tnew,no. But look! I got FUR!"

Jynx felt his face, two fingers pullin=
g on his lip while another found
his nose before he jumped up onto the stas=
is pod and looked down into
the reflective glass to see the monkey face loo=
king back at him.  He
had to wipe off a thick layer of moss growing on the =
pod to see it. 

"Hehe! Shard-areyou-seeingthis?"  He knew he didn't have t=
o ask of
course; Shard was already there, always watching even if he didn't=
 say
anything.

"Unfortunately, yes," came the flat reply.

"OH LOOK!" Jynx=
 exclaimed, ignoring his friend's complete lack of
enthusiasm.  He reached =
back and grabbed his tail.
"I'vealways-wantedatail!"

Holding it close to t=
he end, he brushed it against his hand like a
duster and then put it in his=
 mouth.

Shard watched with growing disinterest and frustration.  "Will you=

stop fooling around? We need to figure out where we are and why we're
here=
."

"Right! Ofcourse-you'reright,you're-usuallyright."  Jynx jumped down
fr=
om the pod and looked around observantly.  "Lookslike-we'rein-ajungle!"

Sh=
ard rolled his eyes and walked over to the pod, opening up it's
computer.

=
"Whatareyoudoing?" Jynx asked, rattling off his usual
hyper-speed-speech th=
at sometimes was impossible to understand. 

Shard started typing at the ke=
yboard.  "Pulling up the flight path of
the pod to see-"

"Oh! Where-we'veb=
een! Good idea!"

"Stop interrupting." Shard growled and continued working.=
  After
several seconds, he stopped typing with a slight frown.  "No flight=
 path."

"No-flightpath??? Wait- whatdoes-thatmean?"

"It means the pod was=
 ejected, which they only do in emergency
situations - like before crashing=
."

"CRASHING??? weCRASHED???"

"Yes, now shut up." Shard kept typing at th=
e computer.  "According to
these projections, we may have been in orbit. Th=
e data looks damaged,
but according to the computer, it's been at least thi=
rty years."

"Years?Thirty? That'sa-longnap."

"Shut up," Shard said again,=
 this time more forcefully.  "Thirty years
is more than enough time to have=
 escaped or gotten rescued...
something must have happened-"

"Predacons!"
=

Resisting the urge to blow up at Jynx, Shard looked up at the jungle.
 Any=
 other bot may have been asking how Jynx would know that, but
Shard knew be=
tter. Besides, it's not like there were than many things
that could have he=
ld back a crew of Maximals.  "Predacons," he concurred.

"Well,solvedthat-l=
etsgo-findtheMaximals-sowe-cansay-hello."

"Slag, no. We're going to the Pr=
edacons," Shard insisted.

"What??  Butthey're-thebad-guysand-they'llprobab=
ly-wantto-killme!
Maximals-arenicer," with that, Jynx started walking, "Let=
sgo-"

"Nicer??" Shard almost yelled, "You must be completely off your
rock=
er! We are NOT joining them and that's final!"

Jynx frowned.  "Rocker? Iha=
ve-arocker?"

"Jynx!"

"Sorrysorry! Right,Maximals," Jynx started walking a=
gain, but only
made it two steps before Shard stopped him again.

"Alright,=
 that's it. You join the Maximals, and I'll join the Preds."

"What??? Butw=
ecan't-  OOOHHH! Youmean-you'regonna-jointhe-Predacons
and-I'lljoin-theMaxi=
mals!!  Andthey-won'tknow! 
It'llbe-likewe-didonCybertron-in-"

"Yes, shut =
up." Shard interrupted again.  "You remember the rules right?"

"Yesyesyes!=
" Jynx replied, "ThoughIstill-don'tsee-why-"

"When I find a safe place for=
 us to be together, I'll tell you," Shard
stated.  He transformed into robo=
t mode and pulled out a small bomb. 
"Stick to the rules until I tell you o=
therwise.  If you run into
Preds, run away, if you find Maximals, get them =
to tell us where the
Predacons are, understand?"  He placed the bomb on the=
 stasis pod.

"Yesyesyes... Jynxremember! Predsrun, Maxisfriends!" Curiousi=
ty
peeked, Jynx reached for the bomb.

"Don't touch that!" Shard said, near=
ly swatting Jynx's hand away.  He
then set the detonator and transformed ba=
ck into beast mode.  "Get
moving."

Jynx watched the bomb blinking for a mo=
ment before hearing Shard's yell.

"JYNX!"

"Rightrightright! Sorry!" Jynx =
called and ran away from the pod before
it blew into pieces behind him.
